TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content:
> 
> triston, you never edited the OP and added the spreadsheet.
> [Here's the link to the spreadsheet for all who are interested.](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1zkSyerSOW16NwyLqvOqxbb28Cu_ag1ulaukiPsvO6hg/edit?usp=sharing)

Nice ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Whoever made this, good job!

> 
> Nice ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Whoever made this, good job!

 I did, actually. Triston is **supposed** to change the OP to the first page of the spreadsheet, (he said he would) but since he's at school now (I have 6 days) he hasn't had the time.
How's it going with LC-40 and 37B? Got any pics yet?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-27T15:22:33Z" title="08/27/2015 03:22  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 27, 2015</time> by \_Augustus\_**

> 
> I did, actually. Triston is **supposed** to change the OP to the first page of the spreadsheet, (he said he would) but since he's at school now (I have 6 days) he hasn't had the time.
> How's it going with LC-40 and 37B? Got any pics yet?

I've been working offshore the last 2 weeks, and have 1 week left. Been doing some minor work on the pads the few hours I have off during the day. All the models are made, but I have not gotten around to texturing yet as I'm also trying to work on 2 other projects during my downtime. When I get home I'll have 3 weeks off work, so I'll have plenty of time to finish up all of my current projects ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Offshore oil drilling platform?

> 
> Offshore oil drilling platform?

 What is the need of that?

> 
> Offshore oil drilling platform?

Yes. I work as a pressure control specialist on the Norwegian sector.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> What is the need of that?

Rockets need fuel don't they? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Yes. I work as a pressure control specialist on the Norwegian sector.
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Rockets need fuel don't they? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

 Yeah, but why land a Falcon 9 there?
Oh yeah you can land your Falcon 9 there and then have it fly back to the KSC to save money!

> 
> Yeah, but why land a Falcon 9 there?
> Oh yeah you can land your Falcon 9 there and then have it fly back to the KSC to save money!

We were talking about where I work, not about adding drilling platforms into the game ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> We were talking about where I work, not about adding drilling platforms into the game ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

 It would be a good idea though. That or giving the SpaceX barge a fuel tank..
Speaking of the barge, we need a name for it.

I looked at the wikipedia page of the Culture series (The barges are named after the GCU's in it) and I found a good name.

"Screw Loose"!

> 
> It would be a good idea though. That or giving the SpaceX barge a fuel tank..
> Speaking of the barge, we need a name for it.
> 
> I looked at the wikipedia page of the Culture series (The barges are named after the GCU's in it) and I found a good name.
> 
> "Screw Loose"!

Yea there are probably alot of good names we could use. I can just add a flag decal so that people can add whichever name they like to it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Yea there are probably alot of good names we could use. I can just add a flag decal so that people can add whichever name they like to it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

 We should do Screw Loose. It sounds awesome and insane at the same time.

> 
> We should do Screw Loose. It sounds awesome and insane at the same time.

There is no point of sticking to one single name. As I said, I'll add a flag decal to the model and then people can change the name to whatever they want.

> 
> I did, actually. Triston is **supposed** to change the OP to the first page of the spreadsheet, (he said he would) but since he's at school now (I have 6 days) he hasn't had the time.
> How's it going with LC-40 and 37B? Got any pics yet?

 I didn't have time to change the OP and add the spreadsheet... I don't think I can do it today either.... Got calculus and ap physics homework to do

There's plenty of tutorials out there
I'll look into it when I get a chance. (Weekend) :-)

Spce x landings? This will be interesting!

- - - Updated - - -

I got a basic surround for the soyuz. We may need to put it up into the mountains somewhere...

> - - - Updated - - -
>

 If you're doing Baikonur, you have to do all of it, not just Soyuz clamps.

> 
> If you're doing Baikonur, you have to do all of it, not just Soyuz clamps.

What about that kk setup that was posted?
I'm looking at what I think is the shuttle landing site in New Mexico. It's called Holloman AFB and it's about 10 miles southeast if White Sands. Pics to come

> 
> What about that kk setup that was posted?

I can make a start. We got NASA's complex so we should have Russias one

Seeing as there are more and more people who either have ideas for this mod, or wants to contribute to it, lets do the following:

Anyone who wants to make a launchpad/launchsite and donate it to this mod, feel free to do so. We will figure out a way to incorporate them all once the mod nears a releaseable stage. Everyone who contributes to this mod will be properly credited in the OP/download.

If you want to contribute to this mod, simply send me or Triston a PM and we will then sort things out. Augustus has made a nice spread sheet with basic information and who is doing what for this mod. Once Triston updates the OP, anyone will be able to take a look at the spread sheet and see which pads/sites are being made. If you see a site that is not being worked on and you want to make it (or make anything else), let us know and we will update the spread sheet accordingly.

I'll make a tutorial on how to make your models into statics and how to place them using KK. Once the tutorial is done I'll have Triston update the OP and add the link to the tutorial.

Sound good? Allrighty then.
Hey, if you guys want help,with testing and advertising, i'd be,happy to,assist!

> 
> Seeing as there are more and more people who either have ideas for this mod, or wants to contribute to it, lets do the following:
> Anyone who wants to make a launchpad/launchsite and donate it to this mod, feel free to do so. We will figure out a way to incorporate them all once the mod nears a releaseable stage. Everyone who contributes to this mod will be properly credited in the OP/download.
> 
> If you want to contribute to this mod, simply send me or Triston a PM and we will then sort things out. Augustus has made a nice spread sheet with basic information and who is doing what for this mod. Once Triston updates the OP, anyone will be able to take a look at the spread sheet and see which pads/sites are being made. If you see a site that is not being worked on and you want to make it (or make anything else), let us know and we will update the spread sheet accordingly.
> 
> I'll make a tutorial on how to make your models into statics and how to place them using KK. Once the tutorial is done I'll have Triston update the OP and add the link to the tutorial.
> 
> Sound good? Allrighty then.

 No need for PM's now! This spreadsheet can be edited, but I have to accept the edits to merge them, so if you want to take up one of the existing things or something else, just add your name and what you're making in the format of the spreadsheet. Keep in mind that usernames are in alphabetical order!
I'm at home at some point pretty much every day to update the spreadsheet, and if liquidhype or triston gives me their Google account name I may allow them to edit the sheet as well.

[Here is the link for those who want to see it while Triston updates the OP.](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1zkSyerSOW16NwyLqvOqxbb28Cu_ag1ulaukiPsvO6hg/edit?usp=sharing)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-27T20:47:57Z" title="08/27/2015 08:47  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 27, 2015</time> by \_Augustus\_**

> 
> I, too, am happy to accept PM's to sort things out and add to the spreadsheet.

There is no point in having too many people dealing with PMs. You'll get notified by either me or Triston if anyone wants to add anything to the mod.
